content.detailedDescription:
her sighting last night was about 7 pm and was multiple lights and 
she
has written it all down.

   but she has 2 other sightings from the past, one of them in about 
1984
where one stopped right over her car. and the other one was in broad
daylight. 

   i told her someone would be calling her back soon. she sounds like a
sensible woman and says that she really does not follow ufo literature 
at
all. even when she had the one over her car (she was with a friend who 
has
since died) they never talked about it afterward.
content.summary: Zigzagging star-sized light(s) followed by a trio of larger golden lights that repeatedly slowly blinked on sequentially and off simultaneously.

content.detailedDescription:
As i topped the hill on fairview rd. just pass rock bluff rd.  toward gold point circle s. on my way to meet my carpool to work. i notice three perfect circles of light moving across the black sky. it was moving from the chester frost park / middle valley area toward the wooded area around gold point circle / chickamauga lake. 

at first i thought the light were an airplane. they looked to be about three to four hundred feet in the air. they were moving too slowly to be an airplane. i also noticed right away that none of the lights were flashing. airplanes have red and green flashing lights on them. the lights were much larger than airplane lights. they looked almost like flood lights, but none of them put out any type of beam, they way a search light puts out a beam that you can see from the side even if it isn���t pointing at you. 

i got to look at it for about a minute. i spent most of that time trying to rationalize in my own mind what i was seeing. as fairview curves to come to gold point circle, i lost sight of it.

on my way home, it was dark. i drove the long way around to drive back down fairview the same way, so i could be sure that i had not mistaken the lights of a new cell tower for the object i saw. i saw two airplanes flying on a similar route, but they were much higher and the lights in no way resembled the lights that i���d seen in the morning. there weren���t any lights in the field of view that i had as i topped the hill.

including bitmap just to represent scale of what i saw.
content.summary: Driving to work noticed lights

content.detailedDescription: Well, i was in the living room of my place when i was looking at the stars whensomething zoomed by! at first i thought it was an astroed but it came back later i was only 5 then, i'm 11 now but i still remember! i was so scared i had no idea what it was so i observed it closly. it moved faster than a bullet but i could follow it with ease. i never told anyone about it until now! the object was ovel and fast, it was really bright. i lost sight of it when i blinked and it was gone! i personaly think it worped to a different planet!
content.shape: Cross,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: It was zooming over my house and the nabourhood it stoped for a minit then darted away!

content.detailedDescription:
my wife, my youngest daughter, and myself were sitting out in our back yard on the southwest side of michigan city. we live in a mobile home park but in the back yard a lot of stars can be seen. we were out then, specifically looking for shooting stars from the upcoming perseid meteor shower.
  it was close to midnight, friday, august 5. my daughter and i were laying on a sleeping bag scanning the skies. my wife was sitting with us in a lawn chair.

  at the same time, my daughter and i both spotted three very faint circular lights coming from a generally northwest direction. they were in a tight triangular formation. the lights were so very orangish pale, like a flashlight on its last battery charge or those orangish street lights. we both called out at the same time.
  as soon as i saw them i immediately lost sight of them (night vision rods and cones stuff?) a moment later i found them again to the southeast just before they disappeared into the sky glow from area lights. my last impression was that they were still the same color, still in a tight triangle formation; with the two "wingmen" very close to being inline with the leader, and perhaps, appearing slightly oval in shape. no sound whatsoever.
it all happened so fast that my wife didn't even see them.
  reactions: 1) wow -what's that? 2) could it be a ufo? 3) maybe its geese? there is a pond several blocks to the south of us. every so often geese will fly over even in the dark. but they usually make a honking sound and they are never lit up.
  in all, the whole thing lasted maybe ten seconds.

                                   dale kilgore
content.summary: Three pale orange lights in a triangle formation passed over.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed a pulsating star-like object was moving from over a tree into plane sight but still pretty far in the sky.When i determined it definately wasn't a satelite (being so much closer than a satelite)cause it was  moving way too fast and thought it was just a plane.It was kind of pulsating a blue and red color(really faint colors). by then i  was actually watching to see when the plane's flashing lights would  come clearer. then the   jetlike plane thing came to a f-in dead stop.It continued to hover to the right and up and down.I then woke my sister and my girl friend.We then noticed another of the same things farther left and alot lower.This one was more active and we watched it hover down then to the right and then straight up.They both hovered around for about two hours then the left one wentreally far to the right and disapeared.We continued to watch the one remaining until all of a sudden a what is typically the discription of a ufo  flew  relly low to the ground and not extremlly far from my house.It was bright with lights lighting up the sky and it was actually really quiet.The other craft after that kinda flew slowly outta sight.
content.summary: Flying then stoped hovered in all directions then noticed another doing same thing

content.detailedDescription:
I walking home and i walked some 2 miles and i saw this ob ject to the west of me in the distance and it was moving away from me.  it was light a very bright fire-like star but was visible during the day-time.

the sun was setting and it was heading that way, so that would have to be the west.  it look very far away (about 5-10 miles away and a very long way up).

i was not paying attension at the time and i looked up and thought, "my god that is a bright star" and i thought, that can't be a star.
i was not fightened in any way and i used to strange things happening and do not fear them.

the object moved very very slowly into the distance and gradually vannished into the horizon.

i watched it as i walked down the street and kept my eye on it hoping to see something intresting.

the object vanished because it simply too far away to be seen in the end.

creed
content.summary: Looks like an orange fire-ball moving away to the west.  it is small but very bright and i saw it in broad day light

content.detailedDescription: I was with my crew at de fremery park, doing the moonwalk in my red michael jackson jacket with my groucho glasses when boom, this sound shakes the hood and we all hit the ground. then, me and my crew want to check it out, so we go in the direction we think it came from cause people are all making ya ya and stuff like it some block party we ain't invited to. we get there and like, we got brothers and sisters from space, i mean black like me, wearing egyptian style. this one who came out of the ship say his name is rotan hotep. he looked kind of like john amos in the beastmaster and he carrying a staff and wearing a trenchcoat. the woman who came out of the ship, she look like shirley hemphill from what's happening, with gold corn rows. then their ship starts blasting a sound system. this was 84, so keep in mind we only had the big boom boxes. i had the big one, we called it conan x cause it was like ten times the decibles of a regular ghetto blaster and bad to be run with a power generator and cranked up so you couldn't hear the generator? well the ship was hovering and so was rotan hotep and this shirley hemphill lookin' sista from space and they be dancing to "september" by earth, wind, and fire. we kept talking about it. i got up in front of my church where i was a pastor in training and told my story, and then i got slapped by the deaconess for blasfimy. i never can forget about it. and seeing the face on mars, i know a designed it and had white slaves who looked like abba carving it, five thousand years ago. rotan hotep and the shirley hemphill lady kept dancing and dissapeared into their saucer, then they took off into the sky. people was crying because life was hard in the hood, and they it was, the proof we was all looking for that the first people were black like us, that they had left the surly bonds of earth like reagan said of the challenger astrounaughts. this was an uplifting situation. we will never forget it.
content.summary: It was full of music and dancings

content.detailedDescription: The night of new years eve in the border city of san luis r.C. sonora mexico. i was sitting facing west looking at the fire works that were being fired up into the sky by my adult and adult nephews when i seen three red spheres in a triangle shape in the west.  i first figured they were rockets but they retain their shape and so i ran inside the house and got my digital camera and started shooting digital still video.  as i shot the video the spheres began to become a straight line while they passed over head of the group that was observeing the lights. there were five to ten persons in our group watching the lights and at least three videos from different cameras were shot. the objects continued going east until one sphere just went dim and it appeared that the last two became one at the end.  i have been told by other's that were visiting ing mexico that night that they also observed the lights.  i have tried to contact the az mufon section with out any luck! i can provide the video if request for a review. i have provide three small files of a video capture for your review in the interm.
content.summary: Three red spheres that appeared in a triangle shape and then went to line formation

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovered just above powerlines  off of highway 87 was going north

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work in rancho bernardo working in a clients back yard at the top of a mountain area.On my way to work i noticed many unusual cloud formations with a heavy mist decending from the swirling patterns from central points of many clouds. i called a friend further north of me to look a few miles south in the sky toward where i was to see if he could see what i was seeing. i pulled over for a few minutes to observe. he stayed on the phone with me untill i got to my job location, and we were puzzled. i hung up, and left my phone in the car and started to work.I was feeling a sort of a buzzing sensation in my spine and body. when i looked up again, i saw the first cloud clearing to a perfect cirle of blue sky and a puff of clouds caused a perfectly formed fire bird into the clearing. the image was very detailed and i could see the feathers on its head and wings.The image rotated in a deliberate counter clockwise direction causing it to look like a swastika, at this time i ran for my phone recalled my friend to ask if he could see it and he could..... the image rotated again after about a minute into a clearly defined spiral. the clouds re closed in on it slowly. my heart was in my throat at this point because the internal vibration and sight of this. my mouth became very dry.  i scanned the sky and saw a very large gasious impression of another shape. 4 donut rings at a box like lay out with more of this heavy gas like material decending from it. on the center line of the box was something like a cloud infolding on itself causing a rib like look of a whale or cylindrical pillar. it looked like a ventilation system without a vehicle behind it.
i have been looking at the sky since and noticed large contrails with paddle like formations on one or both sides. the night of the event i saw huge crystiline ring around the moon at 4 am that night, and again the next morning around the sun. it was hard to sleep and i spent hours trying to research and rationalize what i had seen. i am nervous of reporting it, but also have to know if any one else has seen this. i have taken a few pictures of the contrails since and cary a camera now. please call if you need drawings and i will show a picture of a 1569 ezekiel bible drawing of a very similar occurance. to the 4 points and infolding clouds that he saw as an actual ship. i have to believe they may be able to cloak themselves or something. i am stumped but know what i saw.
content.summary: 2 very large suspected vehicles that left a footprint like vaporous cloud within close proximity to eachother

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my lunch break sitting on  a wall in downtown la when i looked up to see a small metalic ball like object moving quickly and quietly from the east  approx south west to the coast. i didnt think it was a plane or heli. i thought it could be a kids balloon but it was moving to fast ,faster than a plane , moving in a straight line.I pointed to it to alert my co-worker but it was gone out of sight.
also some time last year i saw something similar going the opposite direction that seemed to be following a small plane.
keep looking up !
content.summary: Small silver grey sphere moving very fast
A man stepped outside to smoke when he noticed a brilliant white light hovering low in the sky over neighboring homes.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work near knox street and vermont ave in torrance, california.  i was talking with my coworker and he told me there is a shooting star and i looked up and saw what he observed.  it was a huge fireball with yellowish glow flying in southeasterly direction.  it was heading towards port of long beach, california.  it was flying pretty low or item was really big and it looked like it was flying low.  my coworker just jokingly told me to make a wish.  it flew over the holiday inn hotel on vermont ave and bunch of trees in the area prevented me to lose sight of the object.  since it was flying so low, i was scared it would hit the ocean, cause a big bang, and maybe create a big tsunami.  but it gets even better, maybe an hour after this incident, i got into my car to go home.  as i was driving towards 110 freeway exit, i observed hazmat team hanging out near storm drains near nissan headquarter near 190th street and main street in torrance.   i'm not sure if they are related.  sorry but i have no video or photo evidence to backup my claim.
content.summary: Fireball over southern california sky

content.detailedDescription: Six of us in my girlfriends car in the parking lot of neba's roast beef restaurant parking looking to score and then rick said "hey guy's look at that!" we all looked up above the median above collins ave. coming toward the intersection moving 3to5mph.North, we jumped out and approached the security guard,(back then they had posted a security guard in the parking lot to stop drug dealing.) he was wearing a gun. we pointed it out and i swear to you he simply looked up at it, threw his hands up and said,"well what do you want me to do?" after much cursing and screaming at everyone in the parking lot to look i kind of just stopped and stared at it and said to myself, you better look at it good now because you may never see anything like this again. it was silver like mercury and glass smooth with no sign of seams or windows or doors. about 15to16ft.In diameter the surface was so smooth it looked just like glass or mirror and reflected the streetlights,headlights and all from below,but it was glowing red in the center and on the bottom was a hole about 2ft. with a perfect flame coming out,and i mean perfect. it looked like a butane flame and the craft bobeled on it. it would rock forward then back to the center then rock to the left an back to the center then backward then up to the center then to the right then back to the center, just as if there were a jiroscope inside and it was balanceing by that. then the most unbelieveable thing of all happened, i ran up to a couple walking down the sidewalk and hollered to look up at it. i swear to you they looked at it and looked at each other then back at me and said "oh yea, cool huh!" then proceeded to walk down the road as if it was something that happened everyday. that was when i gave up, i mean i jumped into the car with the other five people i was with and we went south because it was one way on that side of the street and got down to the clearing in the medium to turn around and go north like the craft but it was bumper to bumper traffic and we basicly got ourselves stuck in traffic when the more intelligent thing to do would have been to follow on foot and walk under it and point it out to everyone in their car's and created a hundred or more witness's. it took me years to figure out how outragiously stupid we were for doing things the way we did, but were we being somehow controlled? were we all being involved in some kind of experiment under control of the army core of engineers or the c.I.A.  since 1970 everyone i have told this to, my parents, my friend's even a preacher, has said "well, geez guy you better cut back on that stuff you been smokin'." i have gone through nothing short of a whole education about of what i tell people about these things.  that is i mean, the people that are so hard headed they would not believe in such things even if one landed in their front yard got out and offered the idiot's a tour of their ship!  i know beyond the shadow of a doubt that our government knows everything that is going on.  if we have sattelite's that can see everything going on on the ground (even in 1970 we had several hundred up there and alot of them were for domistic survalence, under president nixon) how could they not see something like this? the simple answer is they can and have and are.  i truely wonder, after hearing about some of the declassified records of the army corps. of engineers releaseing a pnoumonia virus in key west back in 1953 to test how it would effect the civilians as it was caried up the state by the breeze. if you check the records on the death's in 1952,(there were 2) then look at the ones in 1953,(there were 6) then compare it to the one's in 1954 there were 3. it has to make you wonder just what they are up to today. do you think they found a concience and don't do anything like that anymore? we can only pray! i think it is truely amazing that people capture u.F.O.'s on video and yet some people as thick headed as james oberg will still sit there with a straight face and say it is only mass halucination, it makes you wonder how much they pay him to make such a jack-ass of himself? anyway, if you have faith and the common sence god gave a centipede you will know to simply be calm for it will all be all right!
content.summary: N.Miami, 163rd & collins ave.Teetered about 50ft up,glowed red in center,over intersection went behind newport hotel, dissapeared. big as v.W.Van.

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i were working on his car..He was on his back under the dash. i'm a bird watcher..1st tho't i was seeing a big bird flying in from w to e...Appeared like wings were flapping 1-2 times a second (unusual for a big bird). as it passed overhead, became clear it wasn't organic in nature. impression of wing-flapping seemed to be caused by parts coming into and out of sunlight. the object was moving directly w to e. as it passed by me, i had the impression that it could be a smallish jet that was tumbling end over end, altho' it neither gained nor lost altitude, nor changed speed. 
i called my roommate at some point to take a look, and he first said "bird" then "kite" then ruled both of those out.
i continued to watch the object until it passed out of sight..Perhaps 2-3 miles??
my final observations
1. the object was very hard to focus on, even though i have pretty good vision
2. i found it difficult to watch more than a few seconds at a time
content.summary: Originally tho't it was a big bird, then a kite

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my window, i saw something appear, kindof intensify, then bam flew by, like a helicopter, but moving extremely fast.  was in the west, and when it flashed by moved i would say south east -- judging by what i saw through my window.  i'm used to seeing things out of my window. i have never seen anything like it, and i am an amatuer astronomer, having been out in the new jersey pine barrens out in the middle of the woods in the dark and been accustomed to variety of lights, sounds, vehicles of all kinds, and grew up on military bases. could of been a fireball or meteorite, except the only thing is, from videotapings of such events that i have seen, they move slower through the sky than this, usually.
content.summary: Momentarialy a ball of light, then it streaked by, no sound

content.detailedDescription: Looking east on douglas rd. from security park dr. i was doing an appraisal inspection. part of the appraisal is to take a shot looking both ways on the main road. as i was looking east to take a picture, this is the object that i caught. i did not see the object with my eyes. furthermore, my partner also did not see it. i took approximately 60 other photos with the camera and i have never seen such an anomaly in my camera. the area is very close to mather airforce base which is no longer in military use. by the way, the date was 1/5/06 but your system does not go up to 06 yet.
content.summary: Looking east on douglas rd. from security park dr.

content.detailedDescription: This was in georgetown, sc. my girlfriend called me to go b/c she was going to bed (i'm 2 1/2 hours away in columbia, sc), as she was turning off the tv she said she saw something "flickering", she has a phobia of fires so i thought she meant a candle was flickering in her room or something like that. then she starts saying that it's really weird, so i said turn on a light, she said "no, it's outside".  then she begins to describe whatever it is she saw on the phone to me. she is not a "ufo" conspiracy type person but she did say it was not a plane. the thing (3 lights?) were stationary too so it could not have been a plane.  i asked if it could've been a helicopter, she said "maybe" unconvinced. anyways, her house is on a creek and she was looking out towards a bridge which is over winyah bay, so the lights were maybe (my guestimate) half a mile away, or a mile at most. she said it was stationary and then it moved right (in her field of vision: a bedroom window), then it suddenly moved left (not in a jerking motion though, just moved left swiftly), then it was stationary, then it moved right again and then it began to go further in the distance and left her sight. she said it began to look orange before it left her field of vision though (by the way, it didn't just zip off like in the movies or tv, it was more like it went too far in the opposite direction). anyways, it changed colors before she lost sight of it.  she is not the type of person to report this or even believe in this stuff, she thought it was cool, so i got on the internet immediately to see if there have any been any sightings in georgetown, sc before and i stumbled across this sight. i figured why the hell not report it.  i am curious if anyone has seen anything like this before or in the georgetown area before. feel free to call or email.  i reported this as soon as could, this was only about 30 minutes ago.
content.summary: 3 silver or whiteish silver lights, not quite a triangle, but close together, on top of each other

content.detailedDescription: On the above listed day in dallas, tx, i was walking home facing north on a partly cloudy morning when suddenly in the sky in front of me a bright star like object became visible and moved to my left. as it moved it changed from a bright light to clearly a solid object that looked like an upside down saucer and it hovered. as i looked at it, out of the corner of my eye, another bright star like object again appeared and quickly moved to my left and upward stopping parallel to the first object. it looked exactly the same as the first object. as i looked at the two objects, a third star like object appeared at the  same spot as the other two. it also moved to my left, but remained in apearance like a very bright star. as i continued to look at the three objects, i decided to call 911 on my cell. while talking on the phone to 911, all three objects simultaneously moved very slowly behind clouds.I waited several minutes after they disappeared and never say them again.
content.summary: Three ufo's appeared first as bright stars and became visible as solid objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was a usaf air traffic controller at laughlin afb in del rio, texas.  myself and my supervisor were working the 4-12 shift in the control tower.  the base was a pilot training base and the airport area was closed for the holidays.  the radar unit was also closed and the tower was manned by a skeleton crew for emergencies only.  at approximately 7:35 p.M., i looked up to surveil the immediate airport area and i noticed lighted portals and a metallic glint from a huge metallic object just off the approach end of runways 31 left, center and right.  (3 parallel runways)  i immediatly alerted my supervisor and we peered at this object through binoculars for some time. the runway centerlines from left to right are 3,100 feet apart and the apparent cylindrical shape with 13 evenly spaced portals was made to be approx. 3,800 feet in length and/or diameter.  there were rotating lights on top and, oddly, they were red, green and white, the same color combination as you would see on the average aircraft.  we observed this object from appox. 4,400 feet as the tower was about at the center of the airport and the longest runway was 8,800 feet.  since the airbase was essentially deserted, i suggested we call the air police to ride out the perimeter road and investigate.  my supervisor refused to take that couse of action.  we continued to observe this object tranfixedly as we discussed the reporting of the object.  finally, i expressed my intention to take my own car out via hangar row out to the perimeter road and drive up underneath the object.  my supervisor was vehemently opposed and said he would use physical force if necessary to keep me in the tower until midnight.  we continued to observe and during the course of the evening, very bright lights would come on underneath the huge object as if doors were opening and a much smaller object very similar in shape with only 3 lighted portals would emerge only to whisk away so fast that it appeared to disappear.  reappearance was similar as the lights would come on and the smaller object would reappear just as quickly as it left.  during this period of cooldown from previous tension, my supervisor explained that he was adamantly opposed to reporting this sighting to anyone as he had previously reported a detailed sighting and because of it he spent 7 months being debriefed by personnel who did not wear uniforms and 7 years of required psychological counseling.  he called it brainwashing... we observed the comings and goings of the smaller objects through the rest of the shift.  at exactly midnight, the shift was over and i sprinted down the tower stairs across the lawn to my car.  i raced down hangar road and turned by the last hangar to join the perimeter road and the object was gone.  who would believe me when my supervisor would swear he saw nothing??
content.summary: Very large object hovering approx.200 ft. above ground released 3 smaller objects during sighting which returned prior to disappearance.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on rt. 113, decending into the valley of the perkiomen creek in rahns, pa.  i travel this road at least once a day every day.  i was about half-way down the hill when my eyes caught something big in the sky, i looked up as i was braking to come to a stop for the traffic light at the bottom of the hill.  there were three large red crafts(?)appearing right in front, and above me.  it was as if they were being born, they appeared and divided into three separate but equal crafts(?, as soon as they were separate they disappeared.  the shape of these things was strange also, they were not round, or oval, or triangular, they were kind of like a potato shape, really weird.  i have had a very close encounter with a craft when i was about 15, but that i knew was a craft and that it was under intelligent control.  this new sighting was a lot harder to explain.  it was almost as if a larger craft(invisible) was releasing three smaller crafts and they did not realize that they were visible and someone or something said hey guys people can see you and they cloaked(for lack of a better term)themselves.  
as i continued driving north on rt. 113, i crossed over the bridge spanning the perkiomen creek and started climbing the hill on the other side and noticed two people waiting on a corner(i suppose for a school bus)and they were both looking up at the same spot where i just saw the crafts.  i could not pull over due to traffic and also due to the fact that i had to figure this thing out before i dared to talk to someone else about it.  anyway, i got up the nerve to write to you and report it.  have you ever heard a report like this?  just for the record i am a 54 year old grandmother and i don't know why i am the one in our family that has seen these things.
content.summary: Three bright red craft(?) appearing in a clear blue sky as though exiting a tunnel at the same time and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from lunch at 9pm. i worked a 2nd shift at ibm in east fishkill ny. i was driving on the main plant road when i saw this large black object. it was right over my car. i did not know what it was, but it was moving very slow. i pulled my car over to the side of the road. i shut off the car and got outside. i looked straight up at it. it was a dark color, maybe black. it looked like a large triangle. it had 4 lights on it. one light was near the middle, the other lights were near the ends of the triangle. the lights were not very bright, they did not light up the bottom of the object, nor did the white lights light up the ground. it was about 200 feet off the ground and about 1000 feet in length. it slowly went over one of the buildings. i was not scared, i just did not know what i was looking at. it was very cold that night and the stars were out. it blocked out the all of the stars inside the triangle outline. it was moving across from the wind, i know this because while i was looking up at it, i licked my finger to see which way the wind was blowing. i did not hear any noise coming from it. i watched it go over the buildings and watched it go out of line of sight. the total time i saw the triangle was about 4 minutes. after i could no longer see it i got back into my car and went back to work. when i got home that night, after work, i called the state police to see if anyone else saw it. when i asked, the officer handed the phone to someone else. he started to ask me direct questions about it, like how high, what direction, time, color. it had to be about 15 questions. then he said, "must be ultra -lights flying close together." then we hung up. this object was reported in the local news paper around the same time. i have had a lot of time to think about what i saw that night... it was not man made!




*note* (date and time may not be accurate)
content.summary: Low flying large black triangle over ibm plant.

content.detailedDescription:
At the tarry-brea golf course sitting on a bench speaking with an associate. i looked up at the sky and saw the object (not the first time) round, silver and not moving in the sky.I kept on talking to this guy. unfortunately i did not want him to think i was crazy but every time i looked up it was there for 10 minutes. when i looked up for the umteenth time, alll i saw was a vapor trail from a cloud. i had to look multiple times to believe what i was seeing.
at about age 6, half a mile from there i had a contact experience.
content.summary: Round, silver stationery object seen clearly. all left was a vapor trail after a few minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on the farm milking the cows with my father.
we first noticed the object when we were getting a few litres of milk to feed the calves.We saw a light in the sky and thought it was a helicoptor(as we live in northern ireland).But than we noticed there was no apparent helicoptor attached underneath the light.Than we thought that maybe it was a helicoptor landing light but the size/distance/colour/height of the light wouldn't have made this possible. you could tell the object was quite high up in the sky because i watched it for a good 30 seconds and it just remained hovering just below the cloudline as you could see the light reflecting on the clouds above it. it just hovered slowly in a clock-wise direction and made absolutely no noise(we turned off the milking machines to see if we could hear any noise coming from it and it was completely silent).The amazing thing about it was how fast it dissapeared,i wacthed it continually for around 30 seconds,blinked my eyes and it was gone. i would have thought i was seeing things only my father witnessed it also.My reaction after seeing the object was total excitement and amazement.I also felt very calm, i had an unexplainable feeling that whatever we saw meant us no harm and if it was alien life it was only here to study us, not harm us. it was almost as it the ufo sent out friendly vibes to me as i was watching it. my father on the other hand was terrified and to this day doesn't like to talk about what he saw that night. i never reported it until now because i didn't know where to and thought people would think that i was crazy,plus i was too young at the time to know what to do and didn't have access to a computer until recently. we never had a chance to film the event but i found a picture from another witness online that looks exactly like the ufo we saw that night.
content.summary: It was a red/orange/amber disc shaped object hovering silently in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Note: the date was 1/2/06, not 2005 (no option for '06 on the form)

1) i had just finished grocery shopping and i was sitting in the parking lot for a few minutes waiting for my car to warm up a little.

2) i was just gazing at the stars for a moment just thinking about random things, and i saw a triangular object moving to the left and gradually moving lower and further away from me. it was very low to the ground, but still well above the trees. i'm not sure whether or not it was moving fast or whether it just seemed like it was moving fast because of how low it was.

3) i thought it was a normal plane at first, and kept watching it because it was so low and i thought it was about to crash. that was my initial reaction, but after a few seconds i noticed the distinct triangular shape and 4 lights, unlike any plane. it also dawned on me that it was snowing pretty heavily and no one would fly a plane like that. my second thought was that it was a model plane of some kind or someone playing a trick, but it was moving too fast and the lights were way too weird.

4) the object was moving west and moving closer to the ground and made a circle, i couldnt not see it for probably about 30 seconds as it had moved behind the car, then it reappeared on the other side after it made its little turn, then i kind of lost track of it.

i saw the object 15 minutes later as i was driving! it was basically just hovering around or moving very slowly, not in the same spot as previously, but not too far away.

5) i thought it was amazing since i'm always so skeptical of things like this and i've never actually seen a really convincing ufo picture or video, and to see this thing in person was awesome. i wasn't afraid or anything, i don't believe it was aliens, most likely some sort of new us airplane. i almost didn't believe it until i saw it for a 2nd time 15 minutes later.

6) the first time i lost sight, it had moved behind my car, and then it was just hard to keep up with. the 2nd time i was driving, and after a while it just moved to the side of me and i couldn't keep up
content.summary: Black triangle, 3 yellowish-white lights, red light in center

content.detailedDescription: At a train yard in phila, about 5:30am  while walking to the train i noticed a bright light moving across the ground. i thought to myself what is that, and looked up to see a fairly close large blue  (almost florescent) glowing light moving swiftly across the sky, in a north to south direction out of sight. at first i thought it might have been a helicopter's spot light, but there was absolutely no noise. plus it moved to fast to be a copter. i've spent the past two weeks going over & over it in my mind. and rechecking the sight out each day i'm at work. there are wire stantions and wires for powering the train and a expressway overpass in the area. but no obstructions were in the path this object took that morning. 22 years and 5 aircraft carriers in the navy, and i've never seen a craft move the way this one did.
content.summary: On my way to work and saw blue glowing ball moving north to south in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: First, let me start by saying that this event was more like a close call than a just a simple sighting.  on march 9th, 2005, i ventured from near cedar city in s.Utah to groom lake, nevada, roughly 2 hours west.  it was not my first trip to area 51 and i had witnessed ufo's there several times before.  i went on a wednesday night as i had heard from various credible sources that wednesdays were the best nights to go as it was the middle of the week and there would be less precautionary measures taken to hide unidentified objects.  i navigated via a topographic gps to a location point on an open cattle range owned by steve medlin.  i watched three b-52 bombers circle groom lake behind the mountain range which stood in front of me until the sun went down.  i scanned the skies and oly saw the milky way and the stars and it was very dark that night.  about twenty minutes after sun down is when a spectacular event occurred.  first, let me tell you, i never saw them come in.  all of a sudden, they were just there.  there were multiple lights glowing heavy orange.  they appeared all around the sky, three hundred and sixty degrees.  they were as far away as the mountain tops bordering groom lake and as close as the valley floors in some directions.  they held their positions in the sky, but there were brilliant pulses of light coming from them.  when one of the objects pulsed at a certain intensity and number, the other objects stationed around the sky would mimic the same pulses.  i watched this happen for at least 20 minutes.  i had crawled out the window of my suv with my digital camera and was circling my vehicle, trying to get as many shots as i could of the event.  after each shot, i was clicking the dial over to view mode and reviewing my pictures so i could erase any pictures that did not take.  at one point, there was a flash of light behind me that illuminated my vehicle.  i turned around and saw one of the objects very close to me.  i estimated about 300 yards away.  it was a very bright orange color and it was only about 30 feet off the ground.  i have to admit, i felt very intimidated at this point.  i turned my camera toward the object and set the dial back to camera mode but the setting would not change.  i tried to turn the camera off in attempts to power cycle it, but it still remained stuck in the picture viewing mode.  i then witnessed the power locks on my vehicle trigger off and the doors locked by themselves.   luckily my window was still open.  at that point it seemed that somebody cancelled the show as all the objects dissapeared at once.  the weird thing was that when i looked up about 90 degrees, i saw about thirty pin points of light moving high above, somewhat eraticly, toward the east.  about one minute after that, i witnessed what appeared to be fighter jets with blinking tail lights and rumbling engines heading the same direction as if they were in pursuit of these objects, that by the way, were leaving them in the dust.  after they dissapeared, the sky was empty and i saw nothing for the remaining two hours.  let me add one more time that i never saw them come into view or leave view.  they were just, all of a sudden, there and then, all of a sudden, gone.  that's what gives me the creeps about the whole thing.  i get the impression that they might of been there the whole time, long before the sun went down but i could not see them.
content.summary: Close call staking out area 51 in nevada

content.detailedDescription: Was going home about 9:30 at on a cold night, wehen i got on rt. 171 i noticed a green and red light above the mountain. the lights slowly drifted over the highway and stopped. i went north on the road untill i came to a group of cars that stopped looking at this objuct. i got out of my car and watched this for about ten minutes, then the green & red lights went out and a bright white light came on in the middle of the other lights and went straight up into the sky. it stopped and stayed there for about 30 seconds and flew away so fast it left a trail of light. i did'nt know anybody there, but there was about 15 or more people that saw this.
content.summary: Green&red lights drifted over rt 171 sotpped then dissapered a white light came on went streight up and stopped and flew away leaving a trail of light.

content.detailedDescription:
Home watching tv with son .A large light in the woods in back of own house,with a fire light that lit up the sky,
it came down really fast and then we heard  an large explosion  two of then ,i have neven seen anything like that before, the object was in the woods near the river in back .
content.summary: Large fire ball
